title: MNA Maleeka’s left eye cornea injured in opposition’s attack: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib Wednesday said Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI) MNA Maleeka Bukhari’s left eye cornea was injured in the opposition’s attack during the National Assembly’s proceeding the other day.
The minister, in a tweet, said as per the doctor’s report Maleekka Bukhari was attacked by the opposition due to which her left eye cornea had injured.
He said what people they [opposition] were, including their entire leadership, who promoted such attacks and norms. “Even they do not care about the dignity and sanctity of women,” he regretted.
